Key Match Events: Najmul Hossain Shanto, Taskin Ahmed, and Mustafizur Rahman shone for Bangladesh as they defeated Zimbabwe by three runs in a T20 World Cup Super 12 clash that swayed back and forth till the last moment at the Gabba in Brisbane on Sunday.
Pre-Game Insights: There were keen eyes on the performance from the new-look squad led by new skipper Nurul Hasan Sohan in the three-match T20I series against Zimbabwe.
Post-Match Reflections: This particular decision from the management might end up being one of the few rational ones in recent memory.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Although there was little at stake for Bangladesh in the three-match T20I series against Zimbabwe.
